explains: adj. 无限制的；无界限的

sentences.en: Throughout the cultures of the world, East and West, a virtually limitless array of sounds has been employed in the service of musical expression.
sentences.cn: 在世界各地的文化中，无论东方还是西方，几乎有无限的声音被用来服务于音乐表达。
可能性几乎是无穷无尽的。

sentences.en: However, people who view their willpower as a limitless resource get energized instead.
sentences.cn: 然而，那些将自己的意志力视为取之不尽的资源的人反而会变得精力充沛。
